forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some evening rain. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clearing skies after some evening rain. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High 54F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. W winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. WSW winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 62F. WSW winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
